stimulusHtml:
www.lacma.org

In the malagan mask shown, the artist organized the composition to convey a sense of formal balance by
choicesHtml: adding a variety of textural accents to the smooth wooden form
positioning motifs asymmetrically to enhance the uniqueness of the surface patterns
carving similar elements on either side of a centrally placed vertical axis
building in additional features to customize the standard mass-produced base
